sections.heading: Minibike, defined.(1) Minibike means a two-wheel motor vehicle that:(a) Has a total wheel and tire diameter of less than fourteen inches;(b) Has an engine-rated capacity of less than forty-five cubic centimeters displacement;(c) Has an engine power output of less than three horsepower;(d) Has an eng
sections.text: Minibike, defined.(1) Minibike means a two-wheel motor vehicle that:(a) Has a total wheel and tire diameter of less than fourteen inches;(b) Has an engine-rated capacity of less than forty-five cubic centimeters displacement;(c) Has an engine power output of less than three horsepower;(d) Has an engine-rated capacity of less than two thousand two hundred thirty-eight watts; or(e) Was primarily designed by the manufacturer for off-road use only.(2) Minibike shall not include an electric personal assistive mobility device.SourceLaws 2005, LB 274, ยง 37;Laws 2025, LB97, ยง 17.Operative Date: April 15, 2025
